title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.31 - Town of Salina
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.31 - Town of Salina

State Regulations
(a) CR 57
between IR 90 exit 38 and Liverpool Bypass. (b) Evelyn Terrace from Brewerton Road to

Mathews Drive in the Town of Salina. (c) Mathews Drive from Evelyn Terrace to

Dippold Avenue in the Town of Salina. (d) Dippold Avenue from Mathews Drive to the

Axe and Arthur Motor Express, Inc. terminal on Dippold Avenue. (e) Seventh North Street between IR 81, Exit
25, and Electronics Parkway; provided, however, that this route shall only be
used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of the route will be permitted all day Saturday and Sunday. (f) Electronics Parkway between Seventh North

Street and Hopkins Road; provided, however, that this route shall only be used
from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of
the route will be permitted all day Saturday and Sunday. (g) Terminal Park Road between Seventh North

Street and Terminal Park Road East in the Town of Salina. (h) Terminal Park Road East between Terminal

Park Road and its dead end in the Town of Salina. (i) Terminal Park Road West between Terminal

Park Road and its dead end in the Town of Salina. (j) Airport Boulevard. Airport Boulevard
between IR 81, exit 27, and South Service Road. (k) South Service Road. South Service Road
between Airport Boulevard and United Parcel Service driveway, a distance of
0.3+- mile. (l) Commerce Boulevard. Commerce Boulevard between Vine Street and Morgan Road. (m) Monarch Drive. Monarch Drive between

Commerce Boulevard and the Rotondo Warehouse, a distance of 0.2+-
mile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8131.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
